overview:
Mohamed Kahlain is the Vice President, Marketing and Product Innovation at Mediative. Over the course of his career, Mohamed established a clear vantage point on the ongoing evolution of digital media and marketing. He has levied well-earned expertise and insight on e-banking, digital performance, product development, mobile and location-based marketing.

Wielding a comprehensive digital-oriented skill set with significant achievements in digital thought leadership, Mohamed has both the book and street smarts that allow him to excel in todayâ€™s fast-paced and ever-changing media industry.

Prior to his appointment at Mediative, Mohamed was the National Products Director at Yellow Pages Group, the Director for the Homes & Real Estate Channel at Canoe.ca/Sun Media and Chief Strategist for Desjardins.com.

Mohamed holds an Executive MBA from Sherbrooke University, and has attended the MIT Sloan School of Management.
